info.label: Software Engineer
info.brief: I love solving problems with well-architected and well-tested software. I'm a firm believer in test driven development as well as paired programming. I prefer the back end of the stack, and feel most comfortable Springing into action writing microservices. I also enjoy automating mundane processes, like the creation of [this very document](https://github.com/chrisnellis/resume)!

history.summary: I'm responsible for for the back end of our Customer Mobile App, mentoring fellow software engineers, and
highlights: Increased profits on left-handed spin widgets by 35%.
Promoted to Head Ninja after 500 successful cage matches.
